column2: "Destroying larger targets hurts the enemy more than smaller ones. That much should be obvious."
"But in the end, all of the Darkers will be exterminated, so it doesn't really matter how they're divided up."
"But since you seem to be more ambitious than the other ARKS members I've met, I thought this one would be perfect for you."
"Take it or leave it. No one is forcing you to do anything."
